---
title: "Meeting Lead Cheatsheet"
subtitle: "Quick reference for leading lab meetings"
---

## At a Glance

```
Tuesday ─────► Wednesday ─────► Thursday ─────► Thursday EOD
Create         Check            Run             Post
Agenda         Contributions    Meeting         Notes
```

## Tuesday by 5pm
- [ ] Create Discussion thread in lab-handbook repo
  - Title: "Lab Meeting - YYYY-MM-DD"
  - Category: Lab Meetings
- [ ] Copy agenda template from meeting-templates.qmd
- [ ] Fill in: date, your name, presenter name, Teams link
- [ ] Post reminder in Teams #general

## Wednesday
- [ ] Check Discussion for contributions
- [ ] Send final reminder if few items added
- [ ] Confirm with presenter (time needed, screen share?)

## Thursday - During Meeting
- [ ] Review last week's action items (5 min)
- [ ] Facilitate each agenda item
- [ ] Capture decisions and new action items
- [ ] Confirm next week's lead and presenter

## Thursday by End of Day
- [ ] Update Discussion thread with notes section
- [ ] @mention all action item owners
- [ ] Commit notes: meeting-notes/2026/YYYY-MM-DD-lab-meeting.md

## Can't Lead?
Find swap 1+ week ahead → Update .github/meeting-rotation.yml → Post in Teams
